entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 9:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -9.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -12.0°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h becoming north 30 this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
